header.title: Event Planning Meeting for Dime Savvy Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming Event
header.purpose: To discuss plans for the upcoming events, focusing on logistics, budget, and marketing.
header.attendees: Alia, Sebastian, Asfar, Jet, Kang, Rohimi

tasks.Description: Finalize power strip specifications for the Dime Savvy car showcase layout in Central Court with Jet.
Follow up on Klang Sound's quote and availability for the sound system immediately after the meeting.
Inform the person with the trolley cart to stick with the Central Court for the car showcase.
Push Jumbo Rentals for at least a 10% cut on the sound system quote and report back.
Draft the Shaver Gaming media invites.
Lock in Ken Lim's Twitch slot for the Shaver Gaming event.
Handle Dime Savvy media invites and get those out.
Confirm the costume rack specs with Tech Zone and email the sketch to make sure to release purchase order for Shaver Gaming.
Submit the police traffic permit applications for both events.
Follow up with the fire department regarding the COVID-19 SOP and fire safety clearance for both events.
Ping the vendor directly and get a concrete delivery date for the VR demo gear and update the shared document.
Map out specific routes and timings with security and Sebastian for loading and unloading cars/equipment.
Coordinate closely with mall operators to ensure minimal disruption to mall goers during setup and teardown for both events.
Talk to Esports channel about featuring a segment on the CYD Nova EV.
Reach out to HyperX and Logitech, the Shaver Gaming sponsors, to explore cross-promotional opportunities.
Chase Asfar to get the New G Store renovation fire safety audit sorted.
